entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow and local blowing snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
